name: Crazy Shapes: Hero’s Return
description:
Run with Cuebit to save the Magic Animals of Harmony from extinction! Transform your shapes and dodge obstacles in an admirable and unique universe! New planets, various opponents and dozens of amazing traps await you! Complete all the levels, free your friends and destroy enemy minions to gather all Magic Animals and find them a match. Restore the Harmony of the galaxy ruined by the Lord of Chaos!

___________________________________________
Enjoy eye-catching graphics and pleasant music!
___________________________________________

• Swipe to change Shapes and activate their Super Powers.
• Run to complete levels - rescue allies, collect solar energy and search for portals.
• Jump, slow down, speed up and shoot to dodge numerous obstacles.
• Hunt Eggs to raise Magic Animals and find them a match to open new abilities.
• Use Power-ups to complete difficult levels.
• Complete special Daily Missions.
• Learn the history of the universe of Harmony and unravel the mysteries of the Guardian of Shapes and the Lord of Chaos!

You can download and play this game for free!
The game does not require an Internet connection in a story mode – except for some additional functions, such as for searching and hatching eggs, getting daily missions or making in-app purchases.
